website_summaries.verdict: An extra-large portable changing pad that is both plush and versatile.
pros: Provides a clean, germ-free surface for a baby when diapering on the go
Opens to 19" x 30" and folds to 6.5" x 10"
Foldable design makes it simple to put the pad inside a purse or diaper bag
cons: Edges may be too sharp for some babies

customer_reviews.title: "Hacked" pad so the inside doesn't touch the outside
customer_reviews.text: The review voted "most helpful" inspired the "hack." Rip the stitching holding the strap and then fold the pad to the center. Fold again and sew the strap back on. Now a great pad becomes perfect- inside surface doesn't contact the outer surface.
customer_reviews.author: P&E

customer_reviews.title: Great size & quality
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is AWESOME! When unfolded, the pad covers up every inch of a commercial changing table but also easily folds up using very little space in my bag. It's slightly larger and thicker than a DVD case. It doesn't stain either! My kiddo has had quite a few messy diapers, but you'd never be able to tell after wiping the pad down. The quality is great as well. There has been no fraying or issues of any kind. I love the size of this pad and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Everyday Use!
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday use! You don't need an expensive changing table. I purchase this to replace an older pad that we've used for the past two years. This is a large pad so you can get YEARS worth of uses out of it. Use it on the bed, on the couch, or even on the floor. Any flat supported surface will work. Easy to wipe clean (if there's a mess). This portable pad packs up neatly and will fit in any diaper bag or book bag. If you find this review helpful, please click 'helpful' button at the end of this product review. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CTN412

customer_reviews.title: Big enough and small enough
customer_reviews.text: With baby #1 I was all about carrying around a huge diaper bag with every.single.thing I would ever need for baby. With baby #2 I realized that all I REALLY need to carry with me (in my purse) are diapers, wipes, snacks and a change pad. This change pad is big enough to provide coverage for both my tall 2 year old and my newborn. It's also small enough to fold up and fit in my purse. Wipes clean, made of sturdy material and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirlCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Nice-sized mat
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a mat that is big enough to actually put the whole baby on, not with legs or head hanging off. This one is great. Agree with the reviewer that said it's kinda dirty to fold it in thirds because the outside (where you laid it down on the yucky floor) folds and touches the inside where the baby goes. But we just fold it in half first rather than thirds and it's perfectly fine, just leaves a little extra slack on the strap around but doesn't cause any problems.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Fairly well done!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We don't have a changing table and are just using the crib for her changing pad. It works really well! It folds up when not in use and wipes up really well when baby has a little accident before you get their diaper on. We haven't used it outside of our house we actually use Munchkins Arm & Hammer changing pads for travel as we don't travel much with her at this point. Plus if she doesn't make a mess, we reuse them for the whole day! While the inside is easy to clean, we haven't tried to clean the outside. So I can't comment on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve been 5 stars but....
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given it 5 stars if not for 1. It folds on itself. Usually that wouldn’t be a problem for me except that you can’t clean the outside like you would the waterproof side. So you have to keep in mind to wipe it off BEFORE putting your little one on it including after it’s been used 2. I have another changing pad that came with my diaper bag that was a little lore padded than this one. The only reason I needed a new one was because my baby is getting very long and the usual changing pads are not long enough That being said - it is compact and slim when folded and overall not baddies
customer_reviews.author: Girlsun

customer_reviews.title: Hacked!
customer_reviews.text: I moved the strap to a new location, so when I fold it up, the grey inside never touches the black outside! I love this changing pad. It’s huge, waterproof, and heavy duty! It’s perfect! One of the best things I’ve ever bought. It wipes clean very easily and it can go in the washer. I removed the strap. Then I folded it up the way that I wanted it. Then I placed the trap on it to see if it fit. Then I sewed the strap into place. It was super easy. Only took about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...huge!
customer_reviews.text: It is made well! However it is huge!! As you can see in pictures compared to my hand(I have big hands for a women too!) another complaint I have is that the the strap seems to wrap around backwards in my mind. If you are trying to wrap it up while holding a baby it is awkward! I just use this in my living room so a lot of times it is laying open or folded in half, but if you are looking for something to put in a diaper bag I wouldn’t pick this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this sooner? Necessary for large babies.
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the little changing mat that came with my diaper bag! After failing to change my baby’s diaper on the floor of a restaurant bathroom without a changing table since she kept reaching out and touching the dirty floor, I immediately ordered this. It came through as I’d hoped, offering much better coverage even for my large baby. It easily folds down to a surprisingly small size and fits in my bag just as well as the smaller one it was replacing, which was promptly thrown in the trash. Every parent should have one of these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: good with one minor gripe
customer_reviews.text: this changing pad is good quality and quite a big size. never had any problems with it soaking water and it is very easy to clean. however, the vinyl material that is waterproof makes it so that the changing pad is cold. my baby is quite sensitive to it so every time we take off his diaper and his bottom touches the pad, he will cry. in contrast, the free pamper's changing pad that comes with the amazon baby registry gift does not have this problem but the top layer material is not waterproof. if your baby isn't sensitive to cold, this changing pad is probably pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great price & size and handy for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad. Great price and larger than the ones that came with my diaper bags and than other travel ones I've seen. I replaced the one that came in mine with this one. I especially like it for changing diapers in the car. My mom watches my daughter occasionally, so I also bought her one, and she uses it as a little changing station on her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ztaci

customer_reviews.title: Sold a used one, bought another.
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy two of these. The first one arrived without proper packaging. Upon smelling, the mat stank of pee and we thought maybe that's just how the material smells. Threw it in the washer and it got destroyed, but the poop pee smell was still there. Can't even return it since it's destroyed and I chucked it out. Bought a second one and that had no nauseating angels. I'm pretty sure I was sold a used one the first time round. Second one works fine.
customer_reviews.author: VN

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend— not completely sanitary
customer_reviews.text: The thing I dislike about this most is that when you fold it, part of the side that goes against the changing table, then folds up on part of the side that goes against baby’s body... so, it kinda defeats the purpose. I hope that wording makes sense. :) For cleaning, the side that goes against baby’s body (white), is super easy to clean. However, the other side (gray) is NOT easily cleanable. Definitely better product options out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: okay i love this item! i got it today and the material is actually good, and also the size. its not like those expensive changing pad that are small and feels thin. this one is a perfect size and although it doesnt have the place to put diaper or wipes, if u have a bag do you really need those? i think its one thing that makes other changing pad small because they want to make it compact but then again a lot of times its not worth having it with the changing pad coz you done leave without your diaper bag or stroller to put baby stuff in. so for the price and quality i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this! I keep it open here at my house to use on the grandbaby, it covers way more than the other changer pad. I can also fold it up and put it in my diaper bag. I found a different way to fold it so that none of the "outside" surface would touch the "inside" surface. A bit tricky but something the manufacturer should have thought of. After you have your changing pad down on some yucky surface, and you fold it up to put away, you don't want that yucky surface part touching the clean place your little one will be laying next time.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Big changing mat
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a big changing mat, this has you covered. I like that it covers the changing area to wear I dont habe to worry about laying my baby on a diet surface. The only thing is when you fold it up, it folds up into itself the outside ends up touching the part baby lays on. But I guess if you want or use a foldable pad there is no way to not have it that way. It is very durable and a nice color. Not super easy to fold in a hurry but works good.
customer_reviews.author: AngChick

customer_reviews.title: The best changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing pad! It’s easy to fold out and fold up when done. It’s super easy to clean as well. I was paranoid of my baby touching the sides of the public restroom changing tables. This changing pad is extra large and so much better than the changing pads that come with diaper bags. It even has a little bit of padding so it’s comfortable to lay the baby down on. I would highly recommend this to any new parent. Skip the changing pads with the cute patterns and just buy this one! It will give you peace of mine that your baby isn’t touching anything gross and it’s super convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Tong

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag essential!
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! Long and wide enough for larger / taller babies that are still growing. Easy to fold and the velcro strap stays in place really well. Incredible price too! Easy to wipe down if it gets dirty too. We had a SnoofyBee changing pad before this one and it was falling apart so we replaced it with this one and I would never get another kind of changing pad after having this one. The velco is much more durable than the other changing pad we had. Would recommend this over and over as a diaper bag essential!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hacked - no sewing required!
customer_reviews.text: I agree that say this should fold up without having the inside touch the outside for sanitary reasons. One reviewer pointed out moving the strap, but being a new mom I don't have time to get out the sewing kit. I came up with this folding technique that worked just as well (see pictures) and keeps the inside/outside separate. Problem solved! Aside from the one issue it's a nice material, stores pretty small and flat and still has a little padding for baby. I bought this for using on restroom changing tables and I think it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Briana B.

customer_reviews.title: Big and water proof
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty big and water proof. The inside is plastic. So if your little one pees on it while your changing the diaper, its just gonna stay of top or spill sideways. Cleaning is easy, I just wipe it with baby wipe. Its not very compact, but i bought this because we did not have space for a changing table. So I do not need it to be compact. But if you are using it for travel, then it might not fit into a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Long for growing babies
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad, perfect for the baby as she grows. Right now she's still small so I only use the changing pad width wise which is almost her entire height which is 20". Length wise the pad is roughly about 35" or maybe a bit longer. It folds away easily. I can put a diaper or 2 in there along with a small pack of wipes for quick changes. Fits perfectly into the diaper bag for on the go. Would definitely recommend to anyone. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: Biggest changing pad I've ever seen. 10/10 would repurchase. Yes, when you fold the changing pad the "clean" side touches the "dirty" side, but I always wipe the changing table down before I put the changing pad down so this doesn't necessarily bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for baby #2
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller version of this with my first. I hated it. After a certain age, I had to make a decision to which part of her body was gonna be touching the nasty public changing tables. My second, I knew we needed an upgrade. This is the answer. It's huge! I find it so helpful when using at family homes too because he pees everywhere and this thing catches it because it's so wide. Buying this from now on as a shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: RosiesMoM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy for the price. I needed to go back to a diaper bag after my son was born 3 months ago. I've never been a conventional diaper bag user, I want something that is practical, that doesn't cost alot of money. My diaper bag is a $20 backpack that didnt come with a changing pad, this works great. It fits in my bag, is huge in size and easy to use. *my daughter is 4 and about 47 in tall for reference.
customer_reviews.author: newmama7983

customer_reviews.title: Very large, durable and easy to clean! It's a must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing in size ! No more worrying about the baby touching the changing table in public bathrooms anymore lol. Easy to wipe down and clean and easy to fold right back up and stick back in the bag! Very large! .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is such a great buy! It is huge and wide and easy to clean, just wipe and go! Very affordable too! It can be used for home or travelling. Although it doesn't have pockets for storing diapers or wipes, or built-in pillow like the other ones, you can use the strap around it to hold diapers when travelling and the price for this is worth it. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Overall fine but it could be better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this by looking at the price and size compared to the price. However, it is not bad for price but you get what you paid for. It required to be clean very heavily or it will leave stains. It is not super easy to fold as the air gets trap inside and you have to squeeze it out to just fold it. I wouldn't strongly recommend it but for the price is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ruchi

customer_reviews.title: Yes, you really do need an extra large changing mat
customer_reviews.text: With a 16 month old measuring the height of a 2+ toddler I needed a little something extra for his diaper changes. I never worry about him touching something he shouldn’t with this large changing mat while out and about. Just what I needed. Also, the strap holds my wipes and two size 5 diapers with the mat, which makes it quick and easy to grab what I need right out of my tote.
customer_reviews.author: BaileyBlu14

customer_reviews.text: Had ordered this before and it was much better quality but unfortunately my husband left it in a walmart restroom so of course i had to look it up on amazon. Well, its not the same quality as the other. Feels a bit cheaper and stitching isn’t as perfect or great but it gets the job done. Wish it would fold differently too since the outside touches the inside, gross...
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to throw into my purse with a travel sized pack of wipes and a couple diapers. My daughter is 18 months and the size of this is large enough that I don't worry about accidents while changing her. Definitely recommend. I will be purchasing more just to keep in my car, the lower level of the house, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than any of the changing pads I bought yet not big/thick to carry around!
customer_reviews.text: I bought at least 10+ changing pads including skip hop, pottery barns, etc... you name it. They seem practical but when you use them they aren't big enough yet too big/thick to carry... I ran into this one and it's perfect. Just a simple, big changing pad. I carry this one along with a diaper clutch and I'm good to go! I probably won't be looking for another changing pad anymore :)
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: We have one in the diaper bag and one for the house !! It's really big, covers the changing tables whenever we're out somewhere. It's super easy to fold one handed , which is a must when you're out and about and changing baby by yourself in a rest room. It's easy to clean , just Clorox wipe the front and back. Not padded at all, kinda PVC liner on the changing pad side, but still works amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Jan'sFam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these before my son was born. It worked well and lasted till he was almost two. I bought another one to replace the old one which started to fray at the edge near the strap, probably from repeated tugging by a toddler. I still love it because of the large size and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha

customer_reviews.title: Great Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the last changing pad you will ever need. Very nice quality of materials and construction. I think my son will outgrow diapers before he outgrows this changing pad. All that coverage and it still folds up nice as compact so it will easily fit in any diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, I rolled my eyes when my wife added this to the registry. Now that I've used it, I wouldn't travel without one. It's saved a few coffee tables and bedspreads. It's very easy to wipe down and fold back up. It's the right size without having a bunch of extra pockets you don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis K.

customer_reviews.title: Rotting rats smell
customer_reviews.text: If I could describe the smell I’d say it smells like rotting dead rats. I’ve never smelled rotting dead rats but if I had to guess what it smelled like it would be the smell of this mat. I’ve left it outside for multiple days hoping to air it out, I’ve washed it but to no avail. TOXIC
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: A lot bigger than I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot bigger and bulkier than I was expecting. I guess I should have read the info more closely. It’s bigger than my almost 2 year old’s whole body. It works fine for indoor which is why I bought it but I would never carry it in my diaper bag. It’s also fairly thick and doesn’t fold up tight and small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because all the other ones aren’t big enough. Good size, quality is pretty low, and the way it folds is pretty off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: a rare find
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low across Amazon, target, buy buy baby, etc. for a changing pad that wasn't microscopic and would actually cover the entire surface of dirty public changing tables. this was the only one I could find and thankfully it is well made and a good quality product. folds flat nicely and doesn't take up too much room in the diaper bag. it is a relief to finally find a changing pad that will work for my very large/tall 18 month old son
customer_reviews.author: DHD

customer_reviews.title: Love how big it is
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge and simple to fold up. Still flat enough that it slides in the diaper bag. Seems to be fairly durable but I haven’t used it for very long Only problem is that you can’t use the Velcro if you fold it so that the top white later doesn’t touch the black bottom layer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fold pattern does not consider hygiene.
customer_reviews.text: The factory fold sucks. The black part touching dirty surface touches inner white part which will touch baby. Pointless if contamination will eventually touch baby anyways. Instead if the restich technique, you just need to refold in a new way. See pictures. You decide if the wider fold is a problem. It still fits in my diaper bag so it is not a problem to me.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one that came with our diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I thought the "included" changing pad would be any good, but this one is much better than what came with our diaper bag. It folds easily, but has enough padding in it to be comfortable. This has a white plastic surface, unlike the clear plastic (that is already getting torn up!) of the diaper bag pad. Also a good deal larger in surface area.
customer_reviews.author: The Chaz

customer_reviews.title: The solid color design is simple and good looking, it folds up easily and compactly
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this changing pad from the beginning. The solid color design is simple and good looking, it folds up easily and compactly, it is huge in comparison to other pads that aren't big enough when open, and easy to clean. The price is also great. Skip the others and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have two of them - one for upstairs, one for downstairs. I use this on my beds as a changing station because I don't have a changing table. It works great. It would be awesome for travel. The price is great. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Pie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and large
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this. It's large enough my one year old fits on it still. Used it over a year with no issues. Then my husband left a dirty diaper in the diaper bag for a week. Since we don't use the diaper bag often anymore I didn't know until it was too late. The smell will not come out. But I did wash it four times in the washer before the inner liner finally came loose. That is pretty durable since we don't have a gentle cycle on our washer. Once I have extra cash I'm buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Love the length!
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is exactly what I was looking for. My baby is quite long so I wanted to find a pad that would cover most of his length. Not to mention it's soft and easy to clean. It fits in my diaper bag with no problem. I would recommend this to anyone that has a big baby or toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Usagi

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great for taller babies and toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I started using these when my son got way too tall for his changing table before he even turned two. I like that I can use this changing pad and he isn't hanging off on both sides. Especially when you need to change your baby on the go or in the car its good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the larger size of this mat
customer_reviews.text: I love the larger size of this mat. It is great for keeping baby off of questionable surfaces. The inside fold in half before folding all the way up, so the interior surface always stays off of the outside. It is also easy to clean & folds fairly compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Large pad and Folds up small
customer_reviews.text: Great size to travel with. Fits in my Large Michael Kors back pack when folded up and doesn’t take up a lot of room. Folds out to be a huge changing pad which is super nice especially if you have to use a public restroom change station
customer_reviews.author: Gel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel changing pad
customer_reviews.text: We love this changing pad! It is even better than I expected. It's nice and heavy duty. The actual pad side is slick and really easy to clean with a wet wipe. It's easy to fold, and folds quite small. We've been using this daily for a month as our changing pad for when we're not in the room with our changing table, and honestly I use it more than our changing table. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is large enough to accommodate a baby as they grow. It is very easy to use and clean. It folds nicely and fits well in my baby bag. It really is a must have for every baby bag!
customer_reviews.author: ORattan

customer_reviews.title: Good size!
customer_reviews.text: It folds out to be pretty big! Because of the way it folds the bottom which would be on the floor touches the clean inside so I use a wipe really quick to clean it off before I put my baby on it when traveling. It’s sturdy though, great for the price and fits well in my diaper bag :)
customer_reviews.author: SimpleThings

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! If you’re looking for something light, quick, easy & gets the job done. This changing pad is great and compact and definitely will make traveling easy. Also it’s pretty big, not only for an infant a 12 month old can definitely fit as well. Can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: HUGE and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Folds up really compact! I bought this to use as a staging area for when I pump at work. It's huge and covers a large area. When I stop pumping this will be a handy travel changing pad as my son outgrows the infant sized one we have now.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big! Not good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and wipe clean. So far no mess has gotten to the edges but if it did I would just submerge this entire mat and hand wash the black outer material. I do not use this for outside travel because of germs and (obvious) inability to clean both front and back surface after each use. It is only utilized in my home and serves its purpose wonderfully :)
customer_reviews.author: thatbecky

customer_reviews.title: This is the only changing pad you’ll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: This perfectly covers ANY changing table in a public bathroom. It’s perfect. Well padded, easy to fold, easy to clean. I’m so mad I got some pricy tiny one for my baby shower when I could’ve put this thing on the list and been 10x happier. I LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is a life saver. My diaper bag didn’t come with one (Didn’t think that was possible) but this one folded down and fits just fine and is big enough to change our new baby as well as our 2 year old with no mess anywhere except on the pad. It’s easy to clean and large enough to use in those changing tables in public restrooms.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: A nice, simple, but large changing pad. We don't use a changing table at home, just a chanfinf pad. With anither one on the way we knew we'd need another changing pad. I like that these are big enough to change a toddler on. We've tested it out and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pad!
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad blows all other changing pads out of the water. It's comfy for baby, durable/easy to clean, and covers the ENTIRE surface of a public restroom changing table! With a little effort, you can still manage to fold it one-handed and slip it back into the diaper bag. This will last my baby through the entirety of her time in diapers. I like not having to worry about my baby being "centered" on the pad or fearing her coming into contact with a dirty changing table. I don't regret this purchase one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: It’s compact and easy to store anywhere. I love been using it in my living room more than anywhere else but I would recommend! The quality is nice and it was well made!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so cautious when it comes to changing my son in a public restroom. This full body diaper changer comes in handy. My baby has enough room to move around. I love that it's big and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I make sure I do not leave home without this changing pad. Whenever I use the changing tables in public the other changing pads would never cover the whole thing I would always lay a blanket then the bad then place the baby on the take. This product eliminates that for me.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fletes

customer_reviews.title: This pad in huge, very happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife left our pad in a bathroom by accident and I had to purchase this one. We were surprised to see that it is a large changing pad. We are both very happy with our purchase. it appears waterproof and folds easily. Fits inside our diaper backpack easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wieber

customer_reviews.title: Huge but in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is huge! Way bigger than another one I have, which was needed for an ever growing squirmy child. Easy to fold and pack and clean. Appears well made.
customer_reviews.author: ccm

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I would never want to use a regular sized changing pad again. This thing is wonderful. My son is one now and it is so much easier knowing he and I have plenty of room during diaper changes. It also folds and closes well making it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Monique W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a changing table at home so this is super useful. It's cushiony enough to be comfortable for your baby and super easy to clean. Folds up really well for portability. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the size of this changing pad. It is wipe clean which is really a must, and it folds up and stores with a strap. We had an older one that we used for a while that finally needed to be replaced and we had no doubt we were getting another of the same, that's how much we like this changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this item! It is east and folds up nicely to fit in your baby's diaper bag! Whether you will be using it outside or in your home this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: SimplyEvelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Space saver.
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment and opted to not dedicate limited space to a changing station. This was perfect! It's huge. It's not like those small kinds found in a diaper bag. My son is about 26". Easy to use. Easy to clean. Put him on the bed and put away the pad when finished.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this changing pad months ago when my daughter was first born. It’s so convenient! I can fold two diapers, my litttle wipes container, and a disposable changing liner into the full body changing pad and Velcro it up. It fits perfectly in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This mat is just the right size for changing out 2 month old when we're out and about. There's still plenty of room for him to grow too. It wipes clean easily and folds back up for easy storage in his diaper bag. Wish I would have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: A perfect shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Really practical item for visiting grandparents or when just out and about. Use on bed, car seat, restroom changing table, living room or dining table or the floor. And wipe clean, if necessary. Folds flat - it's a perfect shower gift! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shoppersusy

customer_reviews.title: This would be perfect for an older baby or a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my preemie son to go in the diaper bag, ended up placing it up for when hes older and a little bit bigger. This would be perfect for an older baby or a toddler. Its huge!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: A must have item!
customer_reviews.text: Every parent of a kid in diapers should have this item. This is the size these changing pads should be! It covers the entire public restroom changing station surface and is easy enough to fold back up one-handed. I also like that I know which side is the one touching the public surface and which side I am laying my baby on without wondering if I am switching sides or not. I have owned this for over a year now and it is still as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Joe & Elena Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Huge! Ideal to cover entire baby changing table
customer_reviews.text: I love how huge it is! Covers the baby head yo toe and then some. Also completely covers the Baby changing stations, so my LO doesn’t touch and get any germs.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular one because it was big. Most changing pads are barely 21 inches and my baby is already that long! I wanted something that would fit his whole body. The white plastic gets cold and that might bother some babies. But it is a cinch to wipe off fin somethig gets on it. Easily folds back up and velcroes to place in your bag. I really like this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Huge changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest changing pad I've seen and I absolutely love it! It is the perfect size for my 2yr old. Folds easy, is lightweight and wipes clean. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like how it folds up so small easy to keep clean the swipe down and it's large enough for my one year old and it fits in the diaper bag great cuz it folds up so thin great price
customer_reviews.author: Lisa h.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: great item! havent used it yet, but exactly what i was looking for! size is good- large enough without being too large and can fit a few diapers and small pack of wipes for changing!
customer_reviews.author: _reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use at home or on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in lieu of a traditional changing pad/changing table. We change our baby on the floor and this is the perfect size. Baby is currently 25.2" and still has plenty of room. She's had multiple accidents and nothing has spilled onto the floor. Super easy to clean and pack around if needs be.
customer_reviews.author: B. DeKo

customer_reviews.title: great coverage
customer_reviews.text: this changing is extremely wide and it covers just about the same width of a standard changing port in public bathrooms. its not overly bulky and imo has just enough padding to help make it a little comfy for baby
customer_reviews.author: chanpa

customer_reviews.title: Folds small, unfolds huge
customer_reviews.text: It's a changing pad. Its lightly padded and has a waterproof surface. It's primary claim to fame is that it's large, and it is. It's large enough to last my twins until they're out of diapers, but it folds up small in the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Folds up really easy, lays flat. No problems with it so far. If I had any complaint it would be that the strap kinda wraps around it the opposite of the direction I would expect, so it takes me an extra second to get it velcro'd shut, but it's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Edwards

customer_reviews.title: ... pad for 6 months and it has held up great. We've tried 15 different changing mats and this ...
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this changing pad for 6 months and it has held up great. We've tried 15 different changing mats and this is the only one that keeps up with us. It's large enough for my eight month old who is a big boy. It's especially great for traveling where you might not have access to a changing table. This is a definite must have for every new mom
customer_reviews.author: Khabirat

customer_reviews.title: Good value - basic - no zipper pockets
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive & basic changing pad. Perfect as a 2nd one or backup. Our primary is the Skip Hop that has a useful zipper pocket attached. We’ll use this for home diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Lichtenberger

customer_reviews.title: SO BIG
customer_reviews.text: I love the material. It’s super nice and durable feeling. It’s also SO big! Definitely large enough to cover a changing table or use for a growing baby! Not just for infants. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Skye R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price I guess
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this is it’s FREEZING. If your baby is sensitive to the cold (nearly all babies), this pad will upset them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmella B

customer_reviews.title: Great changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This pad is easy to clean and I like that its large. As my baby grows I can continue to use it. The changing pads that come with most diaper bags are usually small and hard to use when baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Tintu Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: As described. The Mat is large and very comfortably fits my baby and with wiggle room to grow. I like how compact it folds up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1111

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my hubbies diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my hubbies diaper bag. I can wrap up the diapers and wipes clutch inside of it and it all stays together, which he loves. And I love that they have a straight black one available now, as it's nice for men to have options as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi G

customer_reviews.title: EVERY MOM NEEDS THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is the only item that alone can make a mother's heart become peaceful at the thought of changing the baby's diaper when you're out and about. I never worry about getting the car seats poopy when using this. This is huge. Forget using the free changing pad that comes with your diaper bag. They're never big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: The changing pad you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this changing pad. I keep one in my diaper bag and one on both changing stations in our house. The size is great because I can keep all my supplies on its clean surface, and I know my squirmy baby will continue to fit on it through out her diapering stage. It's simple to fold and unfold one handed. After a ridiculous amount of time searching this is definitely the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Picture is a standard changing pad that came with our bag vs this pad. I wish I had invested in this sooner. My son is currently two and this works much better than the other pad.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Still potty training? This is a MUST HAVE ON THE GO OR ANYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought 2 more! They are just a great size and effective! Nicely made! Fit any bag and even in the back pocket of daddy’s truck with some wipes and a few diapers!😎👏🏻😂👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mark Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good size for older babies
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go. Public restrooms almost never have covers and you never know how clean the changing station actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Worrierjeb

customer_reviews.title: Big and portable
customer_reviews.text: It was great to use while on the go (extremely portable) and easy to clean with a damp cloth. Pretty big (compare size to my boppy pillow) and folds up really well. However, it looks like it started to get a little moldy in a few spots which is the only reason why I give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: AprilJoy

customer_reviews.title: This should be the standard size for all portable change pads.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the large size! Covered the entire changing station. No more struggling to try and keep baby from touching the exposed nastiness of public changing stations!
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: Huge and Great!
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE! Which is exactly what we were looking for. It seems all of the main market ones are small and my baby is long and moving a ton so I'm glad I don't have to worry about him getting dirty in public restrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Marisabel Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Big changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this changing pad is; you don't have to worry about baby touching any surfaces beyond the pad! It's also super simple to fold back up and wipes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

product_meta.title: J.L. Childress Full Body Portable Baby Changing Pad, Fully Padded for Baby's Comfort, Waterproof, Opens to 19" X 30", Camouflage
product_meta.description: Color:CamouflageProtect baby's entire body with the oversized full body portable changing pad from J.L. Childress. When folded, the changing pad conveniently fits in purse, Diaper Bag or travel bag. The webbing strap can be used to attach diapers and wipes container to the changing pad to create a convenient on-the-go diapering bundle. This portable changing pad is padded for baby's comfort and the diapering surface is easy to wipe-clean and PVC, lead and phthalate free. The changing pad unfolds to 19" X 30", creating an extra-large clean and safe diapering surface that fully covers public changing stations and will accommodate your child as they grow from newborn to fully potty-trained. Keep one J.L. Childress Full body changing pad in your diaper bag, one in the car and they're also perfect to keep at grandparent's homes, daycares, in a secondary room in your home or any other location that baby visits frequently.
feature_bullets: Extra-large changing pad provides a clean, germ-free surface for baby when diapering on-the-go
Extra large: opens to 19 x 30 inches and folds to 6.5 x 10 inches
Wipe-clean changing surface is made of safe, waterproof PEVA which is lead and phthalate free
Folds compact to easily fit in purse, Diaper Bag, or travel bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,038 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
